thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Welcome Home
President Trump greeted a trio of U.S. citizens early this morning who had been detained in North Korea for more than a year after their plane from Pyongyang arrived at a military facility outside Washington. The release of the three men—Kim Dong-chul, Tony Kim and Kim Hak-song—fulfills a longstanding objective for the U.S. It also represents a gesture of good faith by North Korea before negotiations the two sides say will aim to remove nuclear weapons from the peninsula and formally end the 1950-53...
